page.title: 15PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN, CUFFLEY
page.content: Three different play schools exist in the village, the children are then filtered into a fee-paying nursery class which is run in a classroom at Cuffley J.M.I.School.The nursery class has to fund itself,paying rent to the L.E.A. and the salaries of the nursery nurse and the teacher. All these classes are held in the mornings only, and there are generally waiting lists for places.The play schools are held in:-The Undercroft,St,Andrew's. The Free Church Hall. The Youth Centre,Station Road. There are also two Mother and Babies/ Toddlers Clubs which are held for two hours on separate days of the week.The Rainbow Club is held on Wednesday in The Free Church and The Humpty Dumpty Club is held at The Clinic on Thursday The Health Centre in Maynards Place monitors general health & welfare.
